content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: CreateUserCredential path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/users/{user_id}/credentials content: params
name userid
desc a user id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum create api credentials
desc the client secret is returned only once and is not stored by stackpath please take care to save this response
reqbody
identitycreateusercredentialrequest
type obj
name
type str
desc the name of the new api credentials
required true
responses
200
identitycreateusercredentialresponse
type obj
props
id
type str
desc the new api credentials unique identifier
name
type str
desc the new api credentials name
clientid
type str
desc the new api credentials oauth2 client id
clientsecret
type str
desc the new api credentials oauth2 client secret

the client secret is returned only once and is not stored by stackpath please take care to save this response
desc a response from a request to create new user api credentials
title: 4_Authentication_CreateUserCredential_18.json
